title: "'Blank check' mergers have lost their sparkle for startup leaders"
excerpt: "A Silicon Valley Bank report said that of those companies that completed a public listing through a SPAC merger in 2020, about 50% missed their revenue forecasts and 42% saw their revenue decline in their first year as a public company."
